name: iniciatec-todo_list-github.io
description: This is a Todo list project using pug ,sass, typescript and firebase.

scripts.watch: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail 'nodemon --watch src --ext pug build.js' 'nodemon --watch src/scss --ext scss --exec "npx sass src/scss/index.scss:dist/css/app.css"' 'nodemon --watch src/ts --ext ts --exec "tsc -p ."'

author: Vallejos Jose Luis
